channel.title: How do i make an npc talk?

[quote=“Mikey96, post:15, topic:522962”]aww i tried it it gave me 3 errors:([/quote]that’s because

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:522962”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=641455.msg4321352#msg4321352 date=1372260194]

if(npctype == blah){ c.npcUpdate = true; c.forceChat("blah");

Not forceChat lovey. Atleast, I don’t think. O.o
[/quote]not going for exact variables here just giving him a generalization hence not spoonfeeding like somebody else <3[/quote]^^ you will have to put proper variables that’s just the actual layout you will need

item.title: How do i make an npc talk?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

ActionHandler, under the switch in firstClickNpc:

case 1:
	c.getDH().startDialogue(21, npcType);
	break;

In DialogueHandler under the switch:

case 21:
	sendNpcChat4("Hello, this is a test. This is suppose to work", "according to Arham 4 of mopar. If this doesn't", "work, please report this problem to a helper on", "moparscape. They will try to help you.");
	c.nextChat = 0;
	break;

Please, refer to this guide:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[quote=“RankTex, post:4, topic:522962”]could also be in NPCHandler
depends what source your using[/quote]
Be smart, spawn-config, what other source uses that besides PI (I remember this after not working for PI for 1 year lol).

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an npc talk?
